name: Tangy Kumquat-Pear Juice
description: This tangy juice is an excellent cocktail substitute: kumquats give it brightness, tartness, and a touch of bitterness, ginger adds a little spice, and pear make it smooth and rich.
recipeIngredient: 2 ripe Anjou pears, cored and quartered

recipeInstructions.text: Juice ginger and fruit in order listed. Stir juices together and serve immediately, over ice if desired.
